qa: â“ Q: How do I deposit stars into the bot? â— A: The bot is designed to handle your gift balance automaticallyâ€”you don't need to manage star deposits yourself. That said, always exercise caution online: - We use automated bot processes to complete transactions (no in-person handoffs), and we enforce limits and protections to reduce abuse. - If anything looks suspicious or you feel something isn't right, stop the transaction and contact support immediately - If you want extra assurance, check other users' feedback or ask support for verification steps before making a large deposit.
accounts_description: âš™ï¸ Account Management Here you can configure up to 3 individual accounts for automatic gift purchasing. ğŸ”·How it works: â€¢ Our inner bot constantly monitors for new gifts. â€¢ Your conditions are evaluated per account. â€¢ Purchases are executed instantly when parameters match. â€¢ You can add custom filters to each account for maximum efficiency. add_session_description: To link an account: 1. Enter your phone number. 2. You'll receive a login code via messageâ€”this is our bot attempting to log in, so no need to worry. 3. If you have two-factor authentication enabled, you'll be prompted to enter your password.

autobuy_description: ğŸ¯ Auto-Purchase Condition Management Set up to 5 automatic gift-purchase rules. Each condition lets you define flexible limits: â€¢ Min/Max Price: Restrict purchases to items within a specific price range. â€¢ Min/Max Supply: Control based on how many items are available in stock. â€¢ Buy Amount (Stars): Specify how many stars you want to spend for the purchase. â€¢ Recipient: Assign the Telegram account that will receive the gifts. With these options, you can fine-tune and automate your buying strategy with precision.
set_min_price_details: Bot will ignore gifts cheaper than this threshold
set_max_price_details: Bot will ignore gifts more expensive than this threshold
set_min_supply_details: Bot will ignore gifts with supply less than this threshold
set_max_supply_details: Bot will ignore gifts with supply greater than this threshold
set_amount_stars_details: Bot will limit to only use this amount to buy stars
set_recipient_telegram_id_details: Bot will buy gifts to this user/channel
link_details: To link a channel: 1. Get channel ID (@username_to_id_bot) 2. Send channel ID or user ID
not_subscribed: A valid subscription is required to access this feature
